page.title: 15Clubs
page.content: The biggest club in our area is the Royal British Legion Club. They have their branch headquarters in Stratton-on-the-Fosse where they hold their meetings, play skittles, darts, snooker, pool and billiards. It has got a bar which sells drinks, crisps, Mars Bars and Coca-Cola. If you are a member you can get in free. If not it costs 50p. There is a snooker club in Stratton and a Women's Institute club for ladies. They have meetings once a month and usually have a speaker to talk about things like dressmaking and flower arranging. Youth Clubs are held at the Village Halls in both villages. They have games, dancing and music. Sometimes they go on coach trips. The other clubs are Dance, Badminton, Football, Bingo, Girl Guides and Old Peoples'.
